posts.title: How do you design the Vending Machine
posts.description: How do you design the Vending Machine. We will write code to implement a Vending machine that has a bunch of products like chocolates, candy, cold-drink, and accept some coins like Nickle, Dime, Quarter, Cent, etc. Make sure you insert a coin, get a product back, and get your chance back.

posts.title: Designing A File Hosting Service
posts.description: We will talk about designing a file hosting service like Google Dirve, Microsoft OneDrive, Dropbox. This type of cloud file storage service enables users to store their data on remote servers.

posts.title: Designing Instant Messenger
posts.description: Let's design an instant messaging service like whatup, or telegram where users can send text messages to each other through web and mobile interfaces.

posts.title: Designing Service like Instagram
posts.description: Let's design a photo-sharing service like Instagram, where users can upload photos to share them with other users

posts.title: Designing Service Like Twitter
posts.description: Let's design a Twitter-like social networking service. Users of the service will be able to post tweets, follow other people, and favorite tweets.

posts.title: Designing Text Sharing Service like Pastebin
posts.description: Let's design a Pastebin, Pasted, or Chopapp like web service, where users can store plain text. Users of the service will enter a piece of text and get a randomly generated URL to access it.

posts.title: Designing Video Streaming Service
posts.description: Let's design a video sharing service like Youtube or Netflix, where users will be able to upload/view/search videos

posts.title: System Design Interviews: A step by step guide
posts.description: System Design Interviews: A step by step guide

posts.title: Designing a URL Shortening service like Bitly
posts.description: Designing a URL Shortening service like Bitly
